description: Location of heavy equipment including operator with a period of two years.
full_summary:
**Heavy Equipment Rentals with Operator**
==========================================

**Notice:** This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) for the provision of Heavy Equipment Rentals with Operator.

**Procurement Title:** Construction Equipment Rental, with Operator (GSIN 5181A)

**Notice ID:** PW_HAL-412-11575
**Solicitation ID:** W6899-220082/A
**Issued Date:** 2022-09-15
**Closing Date:** 2022-10-06 13:00:00 (Atlantic Time)

**Description:**
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of heavy equipment rentals with operator at 14 Wing Greenwood, Yarmouth Armories and Barrington Radar site, Nova Scotia.

**Services Required:**

* Provide all labour, material, and equipment required to rent and operate heavy equipment
* Service must be provided on an as-and-when-requested basis

**Period of Contract:**
The period of the RISO will be for two years from the date of contract.

**Contracting Details:**
* Agency: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Contracting Authority: Tara Sheppard, tara.sheppard@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
* Bid Receiving Unit: 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, Nova Scotia
* List and contact information for the contracting team are detailed in Annex A.

**Eligibility:**
All interested suppliers may submit a bid.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price.

**Proposal Submission:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically through epost Connect or by mail to the address above.

**Debrief:**
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results.

**Additional Notes:**

* Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
